languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Вы сами прекрасно знаете{/d}, что такая команда бессмысленна, поскольку ставит кибермастифа в позицию, из которой сложнее атаковать врага. Или вы проверяете его аугменты? Что ж, как и положено, Глейто не реагирует на команду постороннего человека".

"{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}You know as well as I do{/d} there is no point in having such a command, as it would put the cyber-mastiff in a position that makes it harder to attack the enemy. Or are you testing his augmetics? Well, regardless, Glaito is behaving as he should by ignoring someone else's order."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Вы сами прекрасно знаете{/d}, что такая команда бессмысленна, поскольку ставит кибермастифа в позицию, из которой сложнее атаковать врага. Или вы проверяете его аугменты? Что ж, как и положено, Глейто не реагирует на команду постороннего человека".

traits.locale_text: "You know as well as I do that there is no point in such a command, because it puts the cyber-mastiff in a position that makes it harder to attack the enemy. Or are you testing his augmetics? Well, regardless, Glaito is behaving as he should by ignoring someone else's order."

"You know as well as I do that there is no point in such a command, because it puts the cyber-mastiff in a position that makes it harder to attack the enemy. Or are you testing his augmetics? Well, regardless, Glaito is behaving as he should by ignoring someone else's order."

"You know as well as I do that there is no point in having such a command, as it would put the cyber-mastiff in a position that makes it harder to attack the enemy. Or are you testing his augmetics? Well, regardless, Glaito is behaving as he should by ignoring someone else's order."

"You know as well as I do that there is no point in having such a command, as it would put the cyber-mastiff in a position that makes it harder to attack the enemy. Or are you testing his augmetics? Well, regardless, Glaito is behaving as he should by ignoring someone else's order."

"{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}You know as well as I do{/d} there is no point in having such a command, as it would put the cyber-mastiff in a position that makes it harder to attack the enemy. Or are you testing his augmetics? Well, regardless, Glaito is behaving as he should by ignoring someone else's order."

"{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}You know as well as I do{/d} there is no point in having such a command, as it would put the cyber-mastiff in a position that makes it harder to attack the enemy. Or are you testing his augmetics? Well, regardless, Glaito is behaving as he should by ignoring someone else's order."

languages.text: 「{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}あなたも私と同じくらい{/d}ご存じのはずですが、そのようなコマンドには何の意味もありません。というのも、それではサイバーマスチフが敵を攻撃しにくい体勢になってしまうからです。それとも、彼のオーグメティックを試しているのですか？まあいずれにせよ、グライトは他人の命令を無視することで、本来の彼の行動をしていますね」
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}You know as well as I do{/d} there is no point in having such a command, as it would put the cyber-mastiff in a position that makes it harder to attack the enemy. Or are you testing his augmetics? Well, regardless, Glaito is behaving as he should by ignoring someone else's order."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたも私と同じくらいご存じのはずですが、そのようなコマンドには何の意味もありません。というのも、それではサイバーマスチフが敵を攻撃しにくい体勢になってしまうからです。それとも、彼のオーグメティックを試しているのですか？まあいずれにせよ、グライトは他人の命令を無視することで、本来の彼の行動をしていますね」

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Ihr wisst genauso gut wie ich{/d}, dass dieses Kommando sinnlos ist, weil es den Cyber-Mastiff in eine Position brächte, die den Angriff auf den Feind erschwert. Oder wollt Ihr seine Augmentationen testen? Wie auch immer, Glaito verhält sich wie gewünscht und ignoriert den Befehl von jemand anderem."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}You know as well as I do{/d} there is no point in having such a command, as it would put the cyber-mastiff in a position that makes it harder to attack the enemy. Or are you testing his augmetics? Well, regardless, Glaito is behaving as he should by ignoring someone else's order."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wisst genauso gut wie ich, dass dieses Kommando sinnlos ist, weil es den Cyber-Mastiff in eine Position brächte, die den Angriff auf den Feind erschwert. Oder wollt Ihr seine Augmentationen testen? Wie auch immer, Glaito verhält sich wie gewünscht und ignoriert den Befehl von jemand anderem."

languages.text: « {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Vous savez aussi bien que moi{/d} qu'il est inutile de lui donner de tels ordres. La position couchée le placerait dans une posture moins adaptée pour attaquer un ennemi. À moins que vous ne vouliez tester ses augmétiques ? Quoi qu'il en soit, Glaito présente un comportement adapté en ignorant les ordres d'une personne autre que son maître. »
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}You know as well as I do{/d} there is no point in having such a command, as it would put the cyber-mastiff in a position that makes it harder to attack the enemy. Or are you testing his augmetics? Well, regardless, Glaito is behaving as he should by ignoring someone else's order."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez aussi bien que moi qu'il est inutile de lui donner de tels ordres. La position couchée le placerait dans une posture moins adaptée pour attaquer un ennemi. À moins que vous ne vouliez tester ses augmétiques ? Quoi qu'il en soit, Glaito présente un comportement adapté en ignorant les ordres d'une personne autre que son maître. »

languages.text: «{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Sabe tan bien como yo que no tiene sentido{/d} programarle tal orden, ya que pondría al cibermastín en una situación comprometida que mermaría su capacidad para combatir al enemigo. ¿O acaso pretende poner a prueba sus auméticos? Bueno, sea como fuere, Glaito se comporta como debe al ignorar una orden ajena».
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}You know as well as I do{/d} there is no point in having such a command, as it would put the cyber-mastiff in a position that makes it harder to attack the enemy. Or are you testing his augmetics? Well, regardless, Glaito is behaving as he should by ignoring someone else's order."

traits.locale_text: «Sabe tan bien como yo que no tiene sentido programarle tal orden, ya que pondría al cibermastín en una situación comprometida que mermaría su capacidad para combatir al enemigo. ¿O acaso pretende poner a prueba sus auméticos? Bueno, sea como fuere, Glaito se comporta como debe al ignorar una orden ajena».

languages.text: “{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}你和我一样清楚{/d}，设置这样的命令是毫无意义的，因为这么做会导致生化獒犬更难攻击到敌人。还是说，你实际上是在测试它的植入物是否正常？嗯，总之无论如何，格雷托都不会听从其他人的命令，这才是它该有的反应。”
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}You know as well as I do{/d} there is no point in having such a command, as it would put the cyber-mastiff in a position that makes it harder to attack the enemy. Or are you testing his augmetics? Well, regardless, Glaito is behaving as he should by ignoring someone else's order."

traits.locale_text: “你和我一样清楚，设置这样的命令是毫无意义的，因为这么做会导致生化獒犬更难攻击到敌人。还是说，你实际上是在测试它的植入物是否正常？嗯，总之无论如何，格雷托都不会听从其他人的命令，这才是它该有的反应。”

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Sizin de bildiğiniz üzere{/d} böyle bir komutun hiçbir anlamı yok. Bu komut, siber mastifin düşmana saldırmasını zorlaştırır. Yoksa ogmetiklerini mi test ediyorsunuz? Neyse, önemi yok. Glaito, başka birinin emrini görmezden gelerek gerektiği gibi davranıyor."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}You know as well as I do{/d} there is no point in having such a command, as it would put the cyber-mastiff in a position that makes it harder to attack the enemy. Or are you testing his augmetics? Well, regardless, Glaito is behaving as he should by ignoring someone else's order."

traits.locale_text: "Sizin de bildiğiniz üzere böyle bir komutun hiçbir anlamı yok çünkü bu komut, siber mastifin düşmana saldırmasını zorlaştırır. Yoksa ogmetiklerini mi test ediyorsunuz? Neyse, önemi yok. Glaito başka birinin emrini görmezden gelerek gerektiği gibi davranıyor."

languages.original_text: "You know as well as I do that there is no point in having such a command, as it would put the cyber-mastiff in a position that makes it harder to attack the enemy. Or are you testing his augmetics? Well, regardless, Glaito is behaving as he should by ignoring someone else's order."
